name: lspsncl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c4))

stmt.origin: sylan2(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c4), wss(csn(c1), c2))
stmt.pretty: sylan2(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, (c3 ` { c1 })∈ c4, { c1 } ⊆ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c4))
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wss(csn(c1), c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(csn(c1), c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c4))
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wss(csn(c1), c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(csn(c1), c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c4))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c4))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(csn(c1), c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c4))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(csn(c1), c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c4))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ { c1 } ⊆ c2)→(c3 ` { c1 })∈ c4)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(LSubSp ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(LSpan ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c4))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` { c1 })∈ c4)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(LSubSp ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(LSpan ` c0)

comment: The span of a singleton is a subspace (frequently used special case of ~ lspcl ). (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2014.)
